title: 11g Latte Base
preparation_steps: Inverted position is easiest for this small volume.

brewing_steps.audio_script: Pour just 60 grams of boiling water. Stir vigorously for 20 seconds. We need energy to extract everything from this small amount of water.
brewing_steps.audio_script_es: Vierte solo 60 gramos de agua hirviendo. Revuelve vigorosamente durante 20 segundos. Necesitamos energía para extraer todo con esta pequeña cantidad de agua.

brewing_steps.audio_script: Attach the cap with a rinsed filter. Squeeze out air. Let it sit for 30 seconds.
brewing_steps.audio_script_es: Coloca la tapa con el filtro enjuagado. Expulsa el aire. Deja reposar 30 segundos.

brewing_steps.audio_script: Flip and press firmly into a small cup. This strong shot is designed to be mixed with steamed milk for a flat white or latte.
brewing_steps.audio_script_es: Voltea y presiona con fuerza en una taza pequeña. Este shot concentrado está diseñado para mezclarse con leche vaporizada para un flat white o latte.

what_to_expect.description: Designed to create a mock-espresso shot for milk drinks. Using a very fine grind, high temperature, and a short 1:5 ratio creates a thick, strong liquid that stands up well to milk.
what_to_expect.audio_script: If you love lattes but only have an AeroPress, this is your recipe. We use a very tight ratio and fine grind to create a concentrated 'shot'. It won't have crema like a machine, but it has the strength and body needed to cut through milk.
what_to_expect.description_es: Un concentrado estilo espresso con cuerpo denso y sabores intensos. Perfecto para agregar leche caliente y crear un latte casero o beber solo si prefieres café fuerte.
what_to_expect.audio_script_es: Este método crea un concentrado similar al espresso. La molienda muy fina, poca agua y presión fuerte producen un shot intenso. Perfecto para lattes o para quienes aman el café fuerte.

notes: Use two filters if you want a cleaner shot, or a metal filter for more body.
notes_es: Concentrado que imita el espresso. Ideal para lattes o consumir solo si te gusta el café fuerte.
preparation_steps_es: Muele 11g de café muy fino (casi espresso).
